attributes.action: Enforce upon Israel to terminate its oppression and injustice against the people of Palestine
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We cannot see how our government as well as the international community is just verbally condemning this issue but in no meaningful way enforcing the immediate cessation of military action against the Gazan population, particularly as the Government of Israel has rejected any ceasefire.

Following 18 months of sanctions which have already crippled the Palestinian people Israel has now decided to annihilate them. There is no acceptable justification for their oppressive and inhumane regime

The US acknowledges the right for Israel to take an offensive stance. Let us not in the UK demonstrate such a lack of integrity

Please help us to be Just especially during times  of suffering

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
